alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 2:54AM CDT until April 03 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Warren County in west central Mississippi... Central Rankin County in central Mississippi... Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Flowers, or 12 miles southeast of Redwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bolton around 305 AM CDT. Brownsville around 310 AM CDT. Clinton around 315 AM CDT. Madison, Ridgeland and Richland around 330 AM CDT. Pearl and Flowood around 335 AM CDT. Brandon around 340 AM CDT. Fannin around 345 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Learned. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
